duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble and start-up new CNC machines to factory specifications.
Utilize precision measuring instruments and perform geometry checks according to measuring protocols.
Read and follow mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatic, and electrical prints/drawings.
Fitting, aligning, calibrating, and adjusting parts and mechanisms to meet tolerances.
Troubleshoot machine errors and maintain a clean work environment.

education_certification.credential: Advanced technician training, completion of related apprenticeship, or a minimum of 4 years related experience.
Understanding of drawings, schematics, and troubleshooting.
